title: Greatclub +2
content:
Greatclub +2 Rare 3~10 Damage 1d8 +2 Bludgeoning Weapon Enchantment +2 Main Hand OnlyTenacity: When you miss an attack, deal (STR Mod) Bludgeoning damage anyway. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: A blue glow radiates through the brass spirals at the end of this heavy club. Greatclub Two-Handed 4.5 95
